mapper.select: SELECT c.ANLS_IDX, i.INSECT_NAME, g.GH_AREA AS GH_AREA, c.ANLS_ACC, TO_CHAR(c.CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CREATED_AT, c.NOTI_CHECK FROM QC_CLASSIFICATION c JOIN QC_GREENHOUSE g ON c.GH_IDX = g.GH_IDX JOIN QC_INSECT i ON c.INSECT_IDX = i.INSECT_IDX WHERE g.FARM_IDX = #{farmIdx} ORDER BY c.CREATED_AT DESC
